actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to make technical corrections in the continuation coverage requirements of group health plans.

summary.text: Amends title XXII (Requirements for Certain Group Health Plans for Certain State and Local Employees) of the Public Health Service Act to make specified changes with regard to: (1) continuation coverage exception rules; (2) the definition of the term "covered employee;" (3) reemployment or Medicare eligibility; and (4) applicable premiums.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to make technical corrections in the continuation coverage requirements of group health plans.
